summary.Title: Experienced Salesforce Developer
summary.Presentation: Who are we?We are Scandinavia’s largest SSL/TLS certificate supplier and a leading provider of scalable PKI and IoT solutions for encryption, authentication, and automa

JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
Who are we?

We are Scandinavia’s largest SSL/TLS certificate supplier and a leading provider of scalable PKI and IoT solutions for encryption, authentication, and automated certificate lifecycle management. We serve 3000+ companies of all sizes, and we have 15+ years of experience within the PKI, SSL/TLS, and certificate management business.

We are currently around 25 employees at our office at Islands Brygge, Copenhagen. We are on a growth journey, and we strive to grow the number of employees and turnover, all supported by a state-of-the-art technical CRM solution built upon Salesforce.

The Role

We are looking for a Salesforce Developer to be a part of our development team. You will be part of a team of 3-5 people working on growing our IT/CRM ecosystems enabled by Salesforce. Our new team member and colleague will be a Salesforce developer within TRUSTZONE. As an experienced developer, you will both be responsible for your own projects and development tasks, but we also expect that you can set high standards and bring best practices to the highly dedicated and ambitious development team at TRUSTZONE via guiding less experienced team members.

Your Responsibilities

  • Implementing new integrations via APIs and maintaining and optimising existing ones.
  • Very hands-on and delivering complex configuration yourself and delivery of features through the guidance of other team members from a development perspective.
  • Designing, creating, and implementing complex logic flows utilizing Apex, triggers, Lightning Web Components.
  • Participate in code reviews for ongoing projects to ensure the highest code quality and appropriate design standards are being utilized


Your profile

  • You have a university degree and a minimum of three years of experience as a salesforce developer.
  • You have practical experience with utilizing custom settings and custom metadata types for complex setup.
  • Strong development knowledge of SFDC, Salesforce Objects, Data Model, approval flows, Reports and Dashboards
  • Experience with custom objects, pages, triggers, workflows, reports, SOQL, SOSL, Data Loader
  • Preferable experience developing and delivering projects in Salesforce Sales/Experience(Community) Cloud, and Service Cloud
  • You can use your agility and curious mind to respond to new challenges in a fast-paced and rapidly changing environment.
  • Flexibility and adaptability are key features of your personality. Being comfortable and able to adapt is important, given that each implementation is built slightly differently.
  • Ability to work with an Agile team environment and contribute to all phases of the software development lifecycle

We offer

A great place to work characterised by enthusiasm and “start-up energy.” We have a dynamic work environment with a shared focus on professionalism, a flat organisational structure, and an informal tone.

This job also includes:

  • An attractive salary package including pension & healthcare insurance
  • Excellent and modern facilities including a healthy canteen
  • Flexible working hours in an Informal atmosphere.
  • Opportunity to influence our product and ways of working, every day.
  • Professional development in an intense and high-growth scale-up environment.
  • A team of international co-workers, all on a mission to make the world a safer place

Application

If you are ready to join our team. Send your application, CV and other relevant documents. We process applications and arrange interviews continually, so we recommend you to apply as soon as possible.

Please do not hesitate to contact HR Manager Tine Cranil on telephone +45 20 72 88 22 or mail: tc@trustzone.com or Operations Officer Jakob Asmussen on telephone +45 25 38 83 65 or mail ja@trustzone.com if you have any questions about the position.

details.Address: Islands Brygge 41, Trustzone Trustzone,2300, København S
